definition: a hundred flowers bloom (idiom); let the arts have free expression
hundred/numerous/all kinds of
surname Bai
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
surname Hua
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)
a hundred flowers bloom, a hundred schools of thought contend (idiom); refers to the classical philosophic schools of the Warring States period 475-221 BC, but adopted for Mao's campaign of 1956
pinyin: bai3 hua1 qi2 fang4 , bai3 jia1 zheng1 ming2

sentences.english: In this aspect, the dissemination study present is all flowers blooms together, has not decided one.
sentences.chinese: 在這方面，傳播學現在是百花齊放，沒有定於一尊。

sentences.english: Last year, Star Wars: The Phantom Menace was big. This year it's more mixed.
sentences.chinese: 去年是《星戰前傳》的熱潮，今年則是百花齊放。
花兒，百花齊放，香飄四野。

sentences.english: It's a highly creative period, and now is the time for ideas.
sentences.chinese: 現在正是百家爭鳴，百花齊放的時期。

sentences.english: A single flower does not do a spring.
sentences.chinese: 一花獨放否則春，百花齊放春滿園。

sentences.english: The world is very much like a garden, whose most beautiful season comes when all kinds of flowers blossom.
sentences.chinese: 世界如同一個大花園，百花齊放，才能更美麗。

sentences.english: Our educational work is like a hundred flowers in bloom, like ten thousnd horses galloping ahead.
sentences.chinese: 我們的教育事業，正如百花齊放，萬馬奔騰。

sentences.english: Contend is a slogan guiding China's literature.
sentences.chinese: “百花齊放，百家爭鳴”是指導中國文學的一條語錄。
花兒，百花齊放，噴鼻飄四野。

sentences.english: Our country's literature and arts scenes are blossoming freely.
sentences.chinese: 我們國家的文藝事業百花齊放。

sentences.english: Letting a hundred flowers bloom, meritocratic purpose of the event is more capable personnel.
sentences.chinese: 百花齊放，用人唯賢才是晚會的宗旨。

sentences.english: Modern Russian literature Flourishes in all kinds of fields.
sentences.chinese: 當代俄羅斯文學呈現百花齊放的姿態。

definition: a hundred schools of thought contend (idiom); refers to the classical philosophic schools of the Warring States period 475-221 BC

to have a unique style of one's own (idiom)
economic prosperity
to push out the old and bring in the new (idiom); to innovate
folk art
to advance by leaps and bounds
(idiom) flourishing/thriving
interdisciplinary
lit. to fly one's banner on a solitary tree (idiom); fig. to act as a loner/to stand out/to develop one's own school/to have attitude of one's own
a galaxy of talent (idiom)/a great number of competent people
to blend/to integrate/to amalgamate/to fuse
composite arts/multi-media arts
in an instant a myriad changes (idiom); rapid substantial change
linked in countless ways
